import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Component } from "react" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" import { Props, KTPData as State } from '../../../interface/Interfaces' import { mapDispatchToProps, mapStateToProps } from "../../../app/functions" class InputKtp extends Component { man: string = 'LAKI-LAKI' woman: string = 'PEREMPUAN' constructor(props: Props){ super(props) this.state = {} } eventHendler = (e: any) => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } submit = () => { console.log(this.state) } render = () => { return( <>
NIK Nama Tempat, Tanggal lahir Jenis Kelamin Golongan Darah Alamat RT RW Kelurahan / Desa Kecamaan Agama Status Perkawinan Pekerjaan Kewarganegaraan Berlaku Hingga

) } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(InputKtp))
